title: Why is Soraka topless in her new splash?
body: Of all the possible ways to frame the angle and shot of a character being portrayed (in this skin) as a cybernetic creature, why in the world would anyone think it's a good idea to highlight - literally - her breasts? She straight up looks topless, which is simply baffling.

replies.body: The whole point of that camera angle and pose was to put you in a POV of a helpless person reaching for Soraka's hand. Because her whole character is built around being a hand of caring and protection. And the Skin was designed in that particular fashion. I don't think they designed the skin like that JUST so the splash art would look kinda hot.

Of course soraka's caring and protection was put into the skin which I like, but that's not the issue. I mean you can't deny her large titties are the same color as her face and looking at the black stuff that's covering her makes it seem that her titties are uncovered and sticking out of her "clothes". Even with the angle (which is nice), the exposing of her titties could be prevented. Now should it be prevented is up for debate if that really is a new skin for her (not aware of many new skins).
Oh man, I guess we should make a safe space on the boards.
Nope, not needed. Was just pointing out that her "breasts" are exposed and it seems obvious. I don't care if it should be kept or changed. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

What do you mean,
> her large titties

First off those aren't even real breasts. They or simply the curvature designed into the metal plates that makes up her chest.

Secondly even if those were real breasts, they aren't even that big. They seem about normal size compared to all the woman I've seen.
Of course she's topless. She's a robot. Robot's don't need clothes.
They also don't need bewbs :P

> [{quoted}](name=SikhRS,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=s8E2nUbx,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-30T23:25:28.495+0000)
>
> They also don't need bewbs :P

nor do they need faces or arms or legs, or a staph in general. But skins are supposed to be recognisable alterations of champions, so all of the robot skins will keep the features of those champions. Soraka, being a female champion, would be less recognisable as a female champion if she didn't have a female body shape.

> [{quoted}](name=ViashinoWizard,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=s8E2nUbx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-30T23:05:21.688+0000)
>
> Of course she's topless. She's a robot. Robot's don't need clothes.

{{champion:61}}
Robots don't have breasts.
They just hold her batteries.
If that's where your eyes gravitate...

>
> Of all the possible ways to frame the angle and shot of a character being portrayed (in this skin) as a cybernetic creature, why in the world would anyone think it's a good idea to highlight - literally - her breasts? She straight up looks topless, which is simply baffling.

Of course she's topless. She has NO clothing, and no need of it. But at the same time, she of course, does not have nipples.
robots do not wear clothes, usually.

Think I'm more conserned with the fact this splash screams for the caption:

Come with me if you want to live!
It's a robot, and no one watches robot porn movies.
I do

Hey, she has multiple ports, and  radioisotope battery storage.  Tom  used to keep his in his gut, in his earlier models.

http://i.imgur.com/R4NsmVv.png
Well you can think she's topless and look for the nipples, upon which you won't find any and realize how dumb this sounds.
If there's no nipples she isn't topless though
Because she isn't wearing clothing at all. So thus topless. There is no need to place clothing on a robot. . . .
She's not bad. She's just drawn that way.
hot.
